NewsArticle.Title: Bug Fix Update
NewsArticle.Content:
Some fixes have been made to some bugs.
1) Courtney the Loures Jester responds to "The Love Letter" not "The Letter".
2) The wizard clue in yard 2 for the pentagram quest should now be fixed. The rogue clue in cr 7 has been replaced to a more obvious spot.
3) The portals to House Macabre has been re-located to appropriate fit the maps.
We are working to fix the purchase of bundled items.
DA Team
